---
title: "Introduction to the tidyverse"
---

Welcome! This is the website for **Introduction to the tidyverse**, a unique 6-week data science apprenticeship with RStudio Academy that begins July 5th, 2022 and goes through the week of August 16th, 2022.

This learning experience is primarily virtual, with two in-person days during [rstudio::conf(2022) in Washington, DC](https://www.rstudio.com/conference/).

* **Virtual kickoff:** July 5th, 2022
* **In-person sessions at rstudio::conf(2022):** July 25-26th, 2022
